reviews.review: This movie has everything. Hysterical comedy, perfection in fight choreography, and multiple gut wrenching moments. It is now my favorite movie of all time, and it isn't even close.

They pulled out all the stops on this one.  My only complaint and it would be a small one would be a spoiler of sorts, so...... Love this movie.  Nothing felt forced or cheesy.  The long movies just moved right from the start.

If you're a Marvel fan, then you're in for an event. If you're not into these comic book movies, there's probably nothing here for you either. Especially with 20 movies of lore you might need a spreadsheet if you don't know your Gamoras from your Promixa Midnights. And no...this is not Black Panther 2. STAY AFTER THE CREDITS!

This movie is Amazing. It's perfect
 It is everything it should be.

Anyone who rates this lower than 5 stars is wrong.

Normally I believe that every one is entitled to their own opinion.  But in this case, i dont. If you don't love this movie, your opinion is wrong. Period.

Raise the tomatoes score to 100%. Anything less is clearly bs.

Excellent! One of the best yet. Plenty of action, quips, and exciting moments. some don't like the length but for me the longer the better. At least for this type of movie. Can't wait for the next one!
As much as I felt like was attending an Avengers' funeral, the Russo Brothers did an amazing job. Loved everything about it. Can't wait for the next installation. Still in shock!
Disappointment on a massive scale... Thor was cool.

A lot of fun but also highly exhausting in many ways. There's no doubt the ambition of this film would inevitably lead to somewhat of a cluttered mess but it actually feels more streamlined than you would expect. That ending is simultaneously bullshit yet surprising. I'm still thinking about it.

Dude!!! That's how you do a big baddy with some skin in the game. I am impressed with what they accomplish in that length on time. I can't help but to compare what I saw in that rushed job Justice league movie, it didn't have that type of skin in the game like this movie had, so what that being said be prepare of what to come in this movie.
